items.sentence: How old were you when you learned to ride a bicycle?
Tom took Mary to a beachfront restaurant for dinner.
Tom took care of my kids when I was in the hospital.
I never should\'ve let you go home alone last night.
I never told Tom I didn\'t know how to speak French.
Tom certainly wasn\'t crying when we left his house.
Tom could\'ve called the police if he had wanted to.
Tom couldn\'t get Mary to tell him her phone number.
Tom peeked into the kitchen through the screen door.
Tom persuaded her into going to the movies with him.
